structured.description: A class named PageInfo that contains information about a page of data fetched from a database or other source. The class has four fields: currentPage, pageLimit, totalPages, and totalElements, which represent the current page being viewed, the maximum number of pages that can be displayed, the total number of pages in the dataset, and the total number of elements in the dataset, respectively. The class also provides a static factory method named of(Pageable, Page) that creates a new instance of PageInfo by passing in a Pageable object representing the page request and a Page object containing the data for the current page.

items.description: is a data structure that provides information about a page of results from a larger dataset. It consists of four fields: currentPage, pageLimit, totalPages, and totalElements. The class also includes a static method for creating a new instance of the class based on a pageable and a page.
items.name: PageInfo
items.doc: A class named PageInfo that contains information about a page of data fetched from a database or other source. The class has four fields: currentPage, pageLimit, totalPages, and totalElements, which represent the current page being viewed, the maximum number of pages that can be displayed, the total number of pages in the dataset, and the total number of elements in the dataset, respectively. The class also provides a static factory method named of(Pageable, Page) that creates a new instance of PageInfo by passing in a Pageable object representing the page request and a Page object containing the data for the current page.

items.description: takes a pageable and a page object as input, returning a `PageInfo` object that contains information about the page number, size, total pages, and total elements.

params.name: pageable
params.description:
pagination context for the page being processed, providing information on the total number of pages and elements available for processing.

* `getPageNumber()`: The page number that corresponds to the current page being rendered.
* `getPageSize()`: The number of elements in each page of the data set.
* `getTotalPages()`: The total number of pages in the entire data set.
* `getTotalElements()`: The total number of elements in the data set.

params.name: page
params.description:
current page being processed, providing information on its position within the total number of pages and the number of elements it contains.

* `pageNumber`: The number of the current page being displayed.
* `pageSize`: The number of elements in each page of the result set.
* `totalPages`: The total number of pages in the result set.
* `totalElements`: The total number of elements in the result set.

returns.description:
a `PageInfo` object containing page number, size, total pages, and total elements.

* PageNumber: The number of the current page being displayed.
* PageSize: The number of elements on each page.
* TotalPages: The total number of pages in the result set.
* TotalElements: The total number of elements in the result set.

items.name: of
items.doc: A class named PageInfo that contains information about a page of data fetched from a database or other source. The class has four fields: currentPage, pageLimit, totalPages, and totalElements, which represent the current page being viewed, the maximum number of pages that can be displayed, the total number of pages in the dataset, and the total number of elements in the dataset, respectively. The class also provides a static factory method named of(Pageable, Page) that creates a new instance of PageInfo by passing in a Pageable object representing the page request and a Page object containing the data for the current page.
